name: Lucky Chant
effect: Lasts 4 Rounds. If a foe were to target the user or their allies and succeed on a Critical or Guaranteed Critical Move, it is a regular success while Lucky Chant is active. Outside of battle, good things happen at the story teller's  discretion.
description: The user chants an incantation to the skies. The beautiful performance grants this pokemon and it's allies divine protection.
